item.description:
May 27th
Vision Board Workshop/Support Group with Fiona Bain from 2-4pm ($20 first time; $10 groupie)
Those who have already attended a vision board workshop are invited to come from 1:30-2pm for a check in – share your progress and insights of the prior weeks, set your intentions. Mamapreneur products will be displayed during workshop.

4-4:30pm Dinner Break @ Alchemy/Pampering & Showcasing Product

4:30-6pm Mamapreneur Activation – $5
Introductions & overview (Imani)
15 minute presentations (Fiona, Maria, Debbie, Imani)
Business Building & Next Steps (Imani & Fiona Bain)
item.name: Law of Attraction - Vision Board Workshop (and discussion group) - Hartford
